header.name: parameters
header.warning: Header /parameters is no longer required, just use /fields.

errors.name: header_start_after_finish
errors.message: Header error: start date/time ({ref_val}) must occur before end date/time ({comp_val})

errors.name: required_field_missing
errors.message: The required header field /{reference} is not present

errors.name: cruise_same_as_experiment
errors.message: Header /cruise should not be the same as /experiment, please make /cruise a 'subset' of /experiment.

errors.name: field_has_wrong_unit
errors.message: The units of '{field_name}', should be '{unit}', not '{bad_unit}'.

errors.name: field_out_of_bounds
errors.message: Measurement #{line}: The '{field_name}' field has value ({value}) outside expected range [{lower_bound} - {upper_bound}].

errors.name: field_number_not_a_number
errors.message: Measurement #{line}: The '{field_name}' field has value ({value}) which does not evaluate to a number.

errors.name: field_is_empty
errors.message: Measurement #{line}: The value for '{field_name}' is empty.

errors.name: data_invalid_date
errors.message: Measurement #{line}: The value for '{field_name}' is malformed (format is YYYYMMDD)

errors.name: data_date_bounds_error
errors.message: Measurement #{line}: The value for '{field_name}' is out of bounds [{lower_bound} - {upper_bound}]

errors.name: data_invalid_month
errors.message: Measurement #{line}: The value for '{field_name}' is malformed (invalid month detected)

errors.name: data_invalid_day_of_month
errors.message: Measurement #{line}: The value for '{field_name}' is malformed (invalid day of month detected)

errors.name: invalid_time_record
errors.message: Measurement #{line}: The value for '{field_name}' is malformed (invalid time pattern)

errors.name: invalid_time_value
errors.message: Measurement #{line}: The value for '{field_name}' is out of bounds

warnings.name: crossing_date_line
warnings.message: /east_longitude [{ref_val}] < west_longitude [{comp_val}], implies crossing the dateline! If you did not do so, please check these values

warnings.name: field_value_missing
warnings.message: The value of the header field /{reference} is missing

warnings.name: obsolete_field
warnings.message: The header field /{reference} is marked as obsolete, please check the documentation.
